1463640.name: RPG Maker MZ - Big Monster Sounds
1463640.description:
The Big Monster Sounds Pack arrives in RPG Maker providing chilling new sound effects for every monstrous encounter in your new RPG creation. These frightening sounds will create both a level of fear and excitement as players encounter beasts worthy of these new sounds. How will you use these new monster sounds in your world full of powerful creatures?

Features:

* 107 sound effects divided in Performing attacks (different intensities): Receiving attack sounds, Deaths, Growls, Shouts, Eating, Breathings, Footsteps, Grunts, Screams
* m4a, ogg and wav formats included
* For use with RPG Maker series or the engine of your choice

Tracklist:

Attack Quick 1-5
Attack Medium Intensity 1-5
Attack High Intensity 1-5
Grunt 1-5
Shout 1-5
Footstep Earth 1-7
Footstep 1-8
Footstep Landing
Eating Loop
Eating Loop With Grunts
Low Growl 1-4
Fast Breathing 1-3
Slow Breathing 1-3
Throat Sound 1-2
Dragon Shout 1-5
Movement Flying Loop 1-2
Movement Spinning Earth Loop 1-2
Receive Attack Quick 1-5
Receive Attack Medium Intensity 1-5
Receive Attack High Intensity 1-5
Aggressive Shout 1-9
Death 1-4
Incontinence Scream 1-7
Deep Low Growl 1-3
Treble Screams 1-3
Quick Shout 1-2

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
1463640.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 韩语
